arts.ttl: Juventus vs Udinese – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Juventus welcome Udinese to Turin for a pivotal Serie A clash on Wednesday. The hosts seek to snap their eight-game winless run in front of their supporters under interim boss Massimo Brambilla. Juventus vs Udinese – Predicted lineup and team news Juventus Team News Locked jointly on 12 points from eight outings, Juventus occupy eighth […] The post Juventus vs Udinese – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
